message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning and risk aversion, which are topics commonly studied in the machine learning community. Specifically, the paper proposes a new measure of risk called reward volatility and develops a policy gradient algorithm to reduce it. This work is closely related to the sub-fields of machine learning such as reinforcement learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), robotics (cs.RO), systems and control (cs.SY), and multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
